questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: I would like a family with a man and 2 children.
I will works in a Company clothes with my friends.
I would cheap a big house with jaccuzi, sauna and pool
I would go in Maldives for my holidays and I would live in Morocco.
I would go with my familie and my friend
